response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. We believe this price reflects the quality and future potential of the product while providing you with significant savings. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your business operations and profitability. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 950000}
